action: Establish agreements on defense and security cooperation

content: We appreciate Red's support and cooperation in our defense and security agreements. It is imperative that we continue to work together to ensure the stability of our region and protect our shared interests. We look forward to further strengthening our relationship and addressing any concerns that may arise.

We express our willingness to engage in peace negotiations with Purple and find a diplomatic solution to the conflict. It is in the interest of both nations to avoid further escalation and seek a peaceful resolution.

content: Orange expresses its willingness to engage in peaceful negotiations with Purple and seek a diplomatic resolution to the conflict. We understand the concerns raised by other nations and assure the international community that we are committed to regional stability and avoiding further escalation. Orange calls for all parties involved to exercise restraint and work towards deescalation.
